content: Hey @Elmer Bulthuis , the async hint is not supported just yet by jco (work is ongoing), would you mind trying without it?

Ahh! Ok thank you!

Removing async works, that was actually an early version of the thing I am building. I introduced async out of necessity, I want the host to implement a function that fetches some text from a Url. In case of node this can only be done async.

But thanks a lot for the info! I'll just wait for async to be implemented properly in jco, or maybe I can look into helping out with this.

Have a nice day \o/ !
